fws_master
Class Measurement

java.lang.Object
  fws_master.Measurement

public class Measurement
extends java.lang.Object

A Measurement is a value received of a slave. When created the current time is saved. This is not the timestamp when the value was measured but it shouldn't be to old so this will be precise enough.

Author:
Johannes Kasberger

getConvValue

public double getConvValue()
Returns the Converted Value. The value is a short value. But the slave can embed a floating point value in a short by multiplying the value. So if the slave measures a temperature value with a precision of 20.2 it saves the value 202. This functions converts it back to a double value.

Returns:
the converted value
